active.text: Next General Meeting: TBD - Check back for updates

homepage.title: Welcome to ODA-USA
homepage.excerpt: Building a stronger Okpella community through unity, development, and cultural preservation.
homepage.content: ODA-USA continues to lead community development initiatives, support educational programs, and preserve our rich cultural heritage. Join us in making a difference.

homepage.title: Dialysis Center Project Update
homepage.excerpt: Partnership with ENAW formalized to bring critical healthcare services to Okpella.
homepage.content: We are pleased to announce progress on the Dialysis Center Project in partnership with Ekhoruioyemen Nation Advancement Worldwide. This facility will provide life-saving care to our community.

homepage.title: Community Library Needs Your Support
homepage.excerpt: Help us maintain and expand the Okpella Community Library's services.
homepage.content: The Okpella Community Library serves hundreds of students monthly. Your donations help us provide staffing, security, and educational resources.
